text: Is there any way to turn on the "Always create contact for new email address" setting for collected forms?
Can anyone tell me roughly what the average "Agency" rate is for HubSpot CMS development? I understand there is a huge range but any info would help.
I’ve seen it range from $15/hr up to $300/hr

well that's quite a range. haha I know it's going to take roughly 30-40 % longer than it would in a CMS we are stronger in, do you think that HS development would cost up to 30% more than the same site in another platform
For complex development I’ve seen it get as high as that Andreas.

In my experience it’s been quite a bit quicker to develop on the HubSpot CMS over other CMS platforms but I’ve also been developing on HubSpot for 6-7 years now. If you are brand new to the platform, it’ll probably take some adjustment period.
ah ok, i thought that complex development would extend the timeframe but not necessarily justify a huge hourly rate
ya exactly! that's the issue with quoting hourly, some people can get things done a lot faster.
it is also the wrong incentive for the developer to get it done in that timeframe, rather that delivering the best result
Ya wont get much argument from a dev slack channel there brother!!
I believe that there are items you are doing in HubSpot which don't warrant an extreme amount of money -- doing front end css / html / simple module stuff is at a certain rate

If you need to have advanced JS, scripting, hubdb, api connects, etc -- this is more than just your basic CMS development, and at times I charge more for some of those items. They don't necessarily take longer, they take more knowledge and strategy to lay it out correctly to make it work.
